name: Dimensions - Multiplayer and Singleplayer
description:
Dimensions is a simple plataformer in 2D with the "Multiplayer Mode", the Premium Pack is: Multiplayer and Singleplayer.

Requeriments:

* Monitor Compatible with 1366x736

* 512 MB of RAM

* 128MB of Video

* Internet Connection (For Multiplayer but exist the "Single Player Adventure Mode" in Multiplayer DLC)

* Mouse and Keyboard
